moduleMeta.name: Soltab
moduleMeta.author: hzfwhy@lzb.ac.cn
moduleMeta.description: Solar Radiation Computation.This module computes the potential solar radiation and the sunrise and sunset times for a horizontal surface and for any slope/aspect combination.

var.name: radpl_slope
var.description: Slope of each radiation plane, specified as change in vertical length divided by change in horizontal length

var.name: basin_lat
var.description: Latitude of the basin, computed as an average of the radiation plane latitudes

var.name: hemisphere
var.description: Flag to indicate in which hemisphere the basin resides (0=Northern; 1=Southern)

var.name: radpl_cossl
var.description: Cosine of the radiation plane slope [soltab]

var.name: sunhrs_soltab
var.description: Hours between sunrise and sunset for each radiation plane

var.name: radpl_soltab
var.description: Potential shortwave radiation for each radiation plane for each timestep [soltab]
